tool_description: Get Pokemon GO coordinates from recently spawned Pokemons
name: PokeCatcher
title: PokeCatcher

api_list.name: Get Pokémons
api_list.description: Get a list of all the recently spotted Pokémons.

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: Country code (alpha-2) E.g: us, jp, ch

optional_parameters.name: date
optional_parameters.description:
Only shows Pokémons that are spotted after the given date. 
Format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH-MM-SS, e.g: 2022-05-04T15:30:00
(Would be used for refreshing the feed.)
